Title: Mandates remote access to public meetings and establishes a fund to assist in implementation
Summary: Mandates remote access to public meetings; establishes a fund to assist in implementing such access.
LawCode: Add §§103-b & 110, ren §§110 & 111 to be §§111 & 112, Pub Off L; add §99-rr, St Fin L; amd §103, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, the state finance law, and the state technology law, in relation to mandating remote access to public meetings and establishing a fund to assist in implementation; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
